import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query inventory actions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries inventory actions with advanced filtering, paging, and field projection options.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Supports the `SupportsCustomFilters` attribute.

**Workflow**:
1. Use this endpoint to search for inventory actions
2. Filter by `InventoryItemId` to find actions for a specific catalog item
3. Filter by `InventoryId` to find actions for a specific stock entry
4. Filter by `EntityId` to find actions related to a ticket
5. Results include expanded `Inventory`, `CreatedByUser`, and `Ticket` objects when requested via Fields

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request options including filters for inventory actions.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for querying inventory actions. Supports filtering by action type, inventory item, location, and entity.","properties":{"ActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions of a specific record."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions at a specific location."},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions related to a specific entity (e.g., ticket)."},"InventoryActionGroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to actions belonging to a specific group key."},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Paging and sorting controls accepted by inventory queries.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based index of the page to retrieve."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Maximum number of records to return per page."},"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Inventory field to sort on, such as `Name` or `LocationId`."},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Direction to sort results."}},"title":"InventoryPagingOptions"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Generic filter used across inventory search identifiers.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of raw values used when filtering keyword or text
